Title: Okja
Description: A young girl's quest to free her genetically modified pig, which is her best friend, from oppressive corporate authorities.

Title: Parasite
Description: A darkly comic thriller exposing falsehoods that construct class structure.

Title: Memories of Murder
Description: A moody hardboiled detective drama following detectives trying to unravel a serial killer mystery in late 1980s South Korea.

Title: The Piano
Description: A mute who communicates through her piano moves from 19th century England to New Zealand where she has to endure the oppression of an arranged marriage and a highly conflicting relationship with another man.

Title: The Power of the Dog
Description: The falsehoods that enforce a certain masculine code of life are ripped open in this tale of revenge and usurpation.

Title: No Country for Old Men
Description: An increasing chaotic thriller in a lawless Texas following an assassin and an everyday guy through a violent thread of fate.

Title: Babadook
Description: A disturbing tale about grief and fear endangering a family.

Title: Nightengale
Description: Story of a woman's vengeance against British colonial forces in 1820s Tasmania.

Title: The Skin I Live In
Description: Horrifying tale of vengeance wherein ethical lines of science and personal identity are blurred.

Title: Broken Embraces
Description: A blind filmmaker's memory unfolds to reveal the intricate and extremely fragile bonds between people over long periods of time.
